refnamediv.refpurpose: 調和平均 : inverse of the inverses average (without zeros)

refsynopsisdiv.title: 呼び出し手順
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: hm = harmean(x) hm = harmean(x, 'r'|1 ) hm = harmean(x, 'c'|2 )

listitem.para: vector, matrix, or hypermatrix of real or complex numbers or polynomials. Rationals not supported.
scalar, or row (if "r" is used), or column (if "c" is used). If x are polynomials, hm is of rational type.

refsection.title: 説明
refsection.para: This function computes the harmonic mean of input values = inverse of the average of inversed non-zero values.
hm = harmean(x,'r') (または等価な hm = harmean(x,1)) は, 行ベクトルhmの各要素に xの各列の調和平均を返します.
hm = harmean(x,'c') (または等価な hm = harmean(x,2) ) は, 列ベクトルhmの各エントリに xの各行の調和平均を返します.
refsection.warning: If x is an hypermatrix and a "r", 1, "c", 2 flag is used, an error occurs.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
harmean(1:10) // Returns 1 / mean(1 ./(1:10)) h = harmean([1 1 0 1 0 1]) // returns 1: zeros are not considered 1 / mean(1./[1 1 0 1 0 1]) // returns 0, as soon as a zero is present
x = grand(3, 4, "uin",-10, 10) harmean(x) harmean(x, "r") harmean(x, 2)
// Hypermatrix x = grand(3,4,2, "uin",-10, 10) harmean(x) harmean(x, "r") // error: not supported harmean(x, 3) // error: not supported
harmean([%z 0]) harmean([%z %z/2]) harmean([%z %i+%z]) harmean([%z %i+%z]) == 1 / ((1/%z + 1/(%i+%z))/2)

refsection.title: 参考文献
refsection.para: Wonacott, T.H. & Wonacott, R.J.; Introductory Statistics, fifth edition, J.Wiley & Sons, 1990.
